definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: Now it is finding a home in China.
sentences.chinese: 於國外，現在沙畫在中國安家落戶。

sentences.english: All Theatre Art Association's Co Artistic Director, Hoi Chiu.
sentences.chinese: 全劇場藝術總監海潮演出風格獨特的沙畫。

sentences.english: I let God take my hand to paint and to convey inspiration via sand animation.
sentences.chinese: 讓上帝帶著我的手作畫，透過沙畫傳達感動。

sentences.english: The art of sand painting first started abroad, Now it is finding a home in China.
sentences.chinese: 沙畫起源於國外，現在沙畫在中國安家落戶。

sentences.english: The art of sand painting first started abroad, Now it is finding a home in China.
sentences.chinese: 沙畫起源於國外，現在沙畫在中國安家落戶。

sentences.english: Ma Tiansheng is currently writing the texts of sand painting.
sentences.chinese: 馬天生現在正在編寫沙畫的課本。

definition: Mao Sui recommends himself (idiom); to offer one's services (in the style of Mao Sui offering his services to king of Chu 楚 of the Warring states)
(music) to change key/modulation/(of an employee) to be transferred to another post
lit. to draw a gourd from the model (idiom)/fig. to copy sth mechanically without attempt at originality
to dress up and make up (like an actor)
(idiom) due to an unexpected turn of events
to volunteer for/to offer to undertake
